title: The Draymond Green Show - All-Star Weekend, Juwan Howard + a Damian Lillard Interview
itunes:title: The Draymond Green Show - All-Star Weekend, Juwan Howard + a Damian Lillard Interview
description:
Draymond discusses the incredible All-Star weekend including Steph Curry and LeBron James' performances and the Juwan Howard incident before welcoming Damian Lillard on the show to discuss his injury recovery, how he felt about the Trail Blazers trading CJ McCollum, how the Blazers are building for the future, whether he thinks he gets the respect he deserves, whether playing in Portland has hurt his luck with free agents, and much more. 

Produced by: Jackson Safon

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
